item.description:
Welcome to everyone intrigued by Hypnosis & Neuro-Linguistic Programming (NLP). Here are the details of the November meeting of the Greater Boston Hypnosis and NLP group. [b]This month’s topic:

Topic:Hypnotic Language

Language and how it is used is key to hypnosis.  It is even key yo self talk, when trying to make changes.

Tonight we will look at language patterns that are very hypnotic in nature.  Milton Erikson used to accomplish most of his therapy in his 'pre-talk'.

We will learn while playing games.  It will be fun.

If anyone has Zebu cards out there, feel free to bring them in.

Kevin Martin, CHT

Hypnotist Positive Effects Methuen, MA (978) 494-4542 kenda_assoc@msn.com www.poseffects.com

---------------------------------- Helping people to help themselves

group.name: The Greater Boston NLP and Hypnosis Meetup Group

item.name: The Greater Boston Hypnosis and NLP Meetup - Lexington-Hypnotic Language
